featured.text: Dognition helps people understand their dogs in ways that they have never been able to do.
For US $60, a recently-founded company called Dognition will help you learn more about your dog’s cognitive traits.
After you plunk your money down, Dognition’s website will take you through a questionnaire about your dog: For example, how excited does your dog get around other dogs, or children?
Then, Dognition guides you through tests that are as fun as playing fetch or hide-and-seek.
Dognition’s test measures a dog’s intellect in several aspects—from empathy to memory to reasoning skills.

other.text: The theory behind the questionnaire used in the Dognition test.
The purpose of Dognition’s testing is to control a dog’s behavior.
The characteristics of the activities Dognition offers.
A dog’s intelligence can be ranked based on the score of a Dognition’s test.
The procedure for evaluating a dog’s intellect on Dognition.
The products one can get by paying a fee to Dognition.
That can give you something to brag about on Dognition’s Facebook page.

definition.zh_def: 對狗的行為和智力進行研究和理解的過程。
definition.en_def: The process of studying and understanding the behavior and intelligence of dogs.
definition.example: Dognition helps dog owners understand their pets' unique personalities.
